trans-unit.source: Generates types and attribute declarations from internal type mapping information for SOAP-encoded message parts defined in a WSDL document.
trans-unit.target: 從 WSDL 文件中定義的 SOAP 編碼訊息部分的內部型別對應資訊，會產生型別和屬性宣告。

trans-unit.source: The SoapCodeExporter class is used by the [Web Services Description Language Tool (Wsdl.exe)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/b9210348-8bc2-4367-8c91-d1a04b403e88) and the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionImporter> class while generating client proxy classes or abstract server classes from a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) document.
trans-unit.target: SoapCodeExporter 類別會由[Web 服務描述語言工具 (Wsdl.exe)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/b9210348-8bc2-4367-8c91-d1a04b403e88)和<xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionImporter>時從 Web 服務描述語言 (WSDL) 文件產生用戶端 proxy 類別或伺服器的抽象類別的類別。</xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionImporter>

trans-unit.source: Instead of using SoapCodeExporter directly, use Wsdl.exe.
trans-unit.target: 而不是直接使用 SoapCodeExporter，使用 Wsdl.exe。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapCodeExporter"></xref> class, assuming no code compile unit.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapCodeExporter"></xref>類別，假設沒有程式碼編譯單元。

trans-unit.source: Instead of directly creating an instance of the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapCodeExporter> class, use the Wsdl.exe tool.
trans-unit.target: 而不是直接建立的執行個體<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapCodeExporter>類別中，使用 Wsdl.exe 工具。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapCodeExporter>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeNamespace"></xref> that specifies the namespace of the types to generate.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeNamespace"> </xref> ，指定產生之型別的命名空間。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapCodeExporter"></xref> class, specifying a code compile unit parameter in addition to a namespace parameter.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapCodeExporter"></xref>類別，指定程式碼編譯單元參數，除了命名空間參數。

trans-unit.source: Instead of directly creating an instance of the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapCodeExporter> class, use the Wsdl.exe tool.
trans-unit.target: 而不是直接建立的執行個體<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapCodeExporter>類別中，使用 Wsdl.exe 工具。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapCodeExporter>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeNamespace"></xref> that specifies the namespace of the types to generate.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeNamespace"> </xref> ，指定產生之型別的命名空間。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeCompileUnit"></xref> that identifies the program graph container to which used assembly references are automatically added.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeCompileUnit"> </xref>識別使用的組件參考會自動加入程式圖形容器。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapCodeExporter"></xref> class, specifying a code namespace, a code compile unit, and code generation options.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapCodeExporter"></xref>類別，指定程式碼命名空間、 程式碼編譯單位，以及程式碼產生選項。

trans-unit.source: Instead of directly creating an instance of the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapCodeExporter> class, use the Wsdl.exe tool.
trans-unit.target: 而不是直接建立的執行個體<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapCodeExporter>類別中，使用 Wsdl.exe 工具。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapCodeExporter>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeNamespace"></xref> that specifies the namespace of the types to generate.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeNamespace"> </xref> ，指定產生之型別的命名空間。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeCompileUnit"></xref> that identifies the program graph container to which used assembly references are automatically added.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeCompileUnit"> </xref>識別使用的組件參考會自動加入程式圖形容器。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.CodeGenerationOptions"></xref> enumeration that specifies the options with which exported code is generated.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.CodeGenerationOptions"> </xref>列舉，指定用來產生匯出的程式碼的選項。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapCodeExporter"></xref> class, specifying a code namespace, a code compile unit, code generation options, and mappings.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapCodeExporter"></xref>類別，指定程式碼命名空間、 程式碼編譯單元中，程式碼產生選項和對應。

trans-unit.source: Instead of directly creating an instance of the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapCodeExporter> class, use the Wsdl.exe tool.
trans-unit.target: 而不是直接建立的執行個體<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapCodeExporter>類別中，使用 Wsdl.exe 工具。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapCodeExporter>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeNamespace"></xref> that specifies the namespace of the types to generate.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeNamespace"> </xref> ，指定產生之型別的命名空間。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeCompileUnit"></xref> that identifies the program graph container to which used assembly references are automatically added.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeCompileUnit"> </xref>識別使用的組件參考會自動加入程式圖形容器。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.CodeGenerationOptions"></xref> enumeration that specifies the options with which exported code is generated.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.CodeGenerationOptions"> </xref>列舉，指定用來產生匯出的程式碼的選項。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Collections.Hashtable"></xref> that contains <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlMapping> objects.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Collections.Hashtable"> </xref>包含<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlMapping>物件。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlMapping>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapCodeExporter"></xref> class, specifying a code namespace, a code compile unit, a code generator, code generation options, and mappings.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapCodeExporter"></xref>類別，指定程式碼命名空間、 程式碼編譯單元中，程式碼產生器、 程式碼產生選項和對應。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeNamespace"></xref> that specifies the namespace of the types to generate.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeNamespace"> </xref> ，指定產生之型別的命名空間。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeCompileUnit"></xref> that identifies the program graph container to which used assembly references are automatically added.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeCompileUnit"> </xref>識別使用的組件參考會自動加入程式圖形容器。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider"></xref> that is used to create the code.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider"> </xref>用來建立程式碼。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.CodeGenerationOptions"></xref> enumeration that specifies the options with which exported code is generated.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.CodeGenerationOptions"> </xref>列舉，指定用來產生匯出的程式碼的選項。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Collections.Hashtable"></xref> that contains <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlMapping> objects.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Collections.Hashtable"> </xref>包含<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlMapping>物件。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlMapping>

trans-unit.source: Add a <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapElementAttribute"></xref> declaration to a method parameter or return value corresponding to a part element of a SOAP message definition in a WSDL document.
trans-unit.target: 新增<xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapElementAttribute"> </xref> WSDL 文件中的 SOAP 訊息定義的組件項目對應的方法參數或傳回值的宣告。

trans-unit.source: This method is used by the Wsdl.exe tool when a WSDL document specifies SOAP encoding, as described in Section 5 of the SOAP 1.1 specification.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法可供 Wsdl.exe 工具 WSDL 文件會指定 SOAP 編碼的 SOAP 1.1 規格第 5 節中所述。

trans-unit.source: The collection of <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeAttributeDeclaration"></xref> objects for the generated type, to which the method adds an attribute declaration.
trans-unit.target: 集合<xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeAttributeDeclaration"></xref>產生的型別，此方法將屬性宣告的物件。

trans-unit.source: An internal .NET Framework type mapping for a single part of a WSDL message definition.
trans-unit.target: 單一組件的 WSDL 訊息定義內部.NET Framework 類型對應。

trans-unit.source: Adds a <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapElementAttribute"></xref> declaration to a method parameter or return value that corresponds to a part element of a SOAP message definition in a WSDL document.
trans-unit.target: 新增<xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapElementAttribute"></xref>宣告對應至 SOAP 訊息的 WSDL 文件中定義的部分項目為方法參數或傳回值。

trans-unit.source: This method is used by the Wsdl.exe tool when a WSDL document specifies SOAP encoding, as described in Section 5 of the SOAP 1.1 specification.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法可供 Wsdl.exe 工具 WSDL 文件會指定 SOAP 編碼的 SOAP 1.1 規格第 5 節中所述。

trans-unit.source: The collection of <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeAttributeDeclaration"></xref> objects for the generated type to which the method adds an attribute declaration.
trans-unit.target: 集合<xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeAttributeDeclaration"></xref>產生類型方法將屬性宣告的物件。

trans-unit.source: An internal .NET Framework type mapping for a single part of a WSDL message definition.
trans-unit.target: 單一組件的 WSDL 訊息定義內部.NET Framework 類型對應。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to add an initial argument that contains the XML element name for the attribute declaration that is being generated; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要新增初始引數，其中包含正在產生; 的屬性宣告的 XML 項目名稱否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Generates a .NET Framework type, plus attribute declarations, for each of the parts that belong to a SOAP message definition in a WSDL document.
trans-unit.target: 會產生.NET Framework 型別加上每個屬於 WSDL 文件中的 SOAP 訊息定義組件的屬性宣告。

trans-unit.source: This method is used by the Wsdl.exe tool when a WSDL document specifies SOAP encoding, as described in Section 5 of the SOAP 1.1 specification.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法可供 Wsdl.exe 工具 WSDL 文件會指定 SOAP 編碼的 SOAP 1.1 規格第 5 節中所述。

trans-unit.source: Internal .NET Framework type mappings for the element parts of a WSDL message definition.
trans-unit.target: 內部 WSDL 訊息定義的項目部分的.NET Framework 型別對應。

trans-unit.source: Generates a .NET Framework type, plus attribute declarations, for a SOAP header.
trans-unit.target: 會產生.NET Framework 型別加上 SOAP 標頭的屬性宣告。

trans-unit.source: This method is used by the Wsdl.exe tool.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會使用 Wsdl.exe 工具。

trans-unit.source: Internal .NET Framework type mapping information for a SOAP header element.
trans-unit.target: 內部.NET Framework 型別對應資訊的 SOAP 標頭項目。
